statements: DELETE FROM Species_Diversity WHERE environment = 'Forest' AND population_size > 10000
DELETE FROM genetic_data WHERE population > 100 AND allele_frequency < 0.05;
DELETE FROM species WHERE environment = 'forest' AND population_size < 5000;
DELETE FROM Diversity WHERE diversity_index > 0.5 AND species_id = 1;
DELETE FROM GeneticDrift WHERE num_generations < 100 AND drift_id = 3;
DELETE FROM individuals WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 50;
